name: Chief's Quest
description: Chief's Quest is a classic action platform game inspired by native american culture and anime
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space Additional Notes: Native game spec ratio is 16:9. Compatible with xbox 360 and dualshock 4 gamepads.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space Additional Notes: Native game spec ratio is 16:9. Compatible with xbox 360 and dualshock 4 gamepads.
